2.caption_en:
A bold turquoise uppercase quote on a dark blue background stating entrepreneurial, investor and fatherly motivations about tools, network effects, scalability, and building a sustainable future for his children.

{
  "type": "text_poster",
  "text": "“AS AN ENTREPRENEUR, I WANT PROVEN TOOLS AND CLARITY; AS AN INVESTOR I SEEK TO UNLOCK NETWORK EFFECTS AND SCALABILITY; AS A FATHER I WANT TO BUILD A SUSTAINABLE FUTURE FOR MY KIDS.",
  "lines": [
    "“AS AN ENTREPRENEUR, I WANT",
    "PROVEN TOOLS AND CLARITY;",
    "AS AN INVESTOR I SEEK TO UNLOCK",
    "NETWORK EFFECTS AND SCALABILITY;",
    "AS A FATHER I WANT TO BUILD A",
    "SUSTAINABLE FUTURE FOR MY KIDS."
  ],
  "language": "en",
  "text_case": "uppercase",
  "font": {
    "weight": "bold",
    "style": "geometric sans-serif",
    "size": "very_large_display"
  },
  "colors": {
    "text": "#4FD7DF",
    "background": "#2D3F48"
  },
  "layout": {
    "alignment": "left",
    "line_spacing": "tight",
    "padding": "small"
  },
  "bounding_box": {
    "x": 0,
    "y": 0,
    "width": 1.0,
    "height": 1.0,
    "unit": "normalized"
  },
  "visual_notes": "Opening quotation mark present; semicolons separate clauses; full-bleed headline-style composition.",
  "confidence": 0.95
}
